creator: Creator
refuse dtag transfer description: <0/> refuse to transfers their DTag to <1/>
cancel dtag transfer description: <0/> cancel the DTag transfer request sent to <1/>
link application description: <0/> link their <1>{{ application }}</1> account having username <2>{{ username }}</2> to their profile
unlink application description: <0/> unlink their <1>{{ application }}</1> account from their profile
link chain account description: <0/> link their <1>{{ chain }}</1> account <2/> to their profile
unlink chain account description: <0/> unlink their <1>{{ chain }}</1> account <2/> from their profile
